question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
question.swahili: Kwa kipindi cha wiki mbili zilizopita, je, ni mara ngapi umehisi kutumbuliwa na matatizo yafuatayo? Kuwa na wasiwasi, mwenye hofu

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Not being able to s top or control worrying
question.swahili: Kwa kipindi cha wiki mbili zilizopita, je, ni mara ngapi umehisi kutumbuliwa na matatizo yafuatayo? Kutoweza kuzuia hofu au kudhibiti wasiwasi

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Worrying too much about different things
question.swahili: Kwa kipindi cha wiki mbili zilizopita, je, ni mara ngapi umehisi kutumbuliwa na matatizo yafuatayo? Mwenye wasiwasi kupita kiasi kuhusu mambo tofauti tofauti

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Trouble relaxing
question.swahili: Kwa kipindi cha wiki mbili zilizopita, je, ni mara ngapi umehisi kutumbuliwa na matatizo yafuatayo? Mwenye tatizo la kutulia na kupumzika/kustarehe

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
question.swahili: Kwa kipindi cha wiki mbili zilizopita, je, ni mara ngapi umehisi kutumbuliwa na matatizo yafuatayo? Uliyekosa utulivu sana kiasi cha kutoweza kukaa mahali pamoja

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Becoming easily annoyed or irritable
question.swahili: Kwa kipindi cha wiki mbili zilizopita, je, ni mara ngapi umehisi kutumbuliwa na matatizo yafuatayo? Mwenye hasira, ama kukerwa kwa haraka

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling afraid, as if something awful
question.swahili: Kwa kipindi cha wiki mbili zilizopita, je, ni mara ngapi umehisi kutumbuliwa na matatizo yafuatayo? Mwenye woga ni kana kwamba jambo baya linaweza kutokea wakati wowote

question.english: Over the past year, have there been times when you felt very happy indeed without a break for days on end?
question.swahili: Katika mwaka uliopita, umewahi kuhisi kufurahi sana bila mapumziko kwa siku kadhaa mfululizo?

question.english: Was there an obvious reason for this?
question.swahili: Je, kulikuwa na sababu dhahiri ya hisia hizi?

question.english: Did your relatives or friends think it was strange or complain about it?
question.swahili: Je, jamaa au marafiki zako waliona ni ajabu au kulalamika kuhusu hilo?

question.english: Over the past year, have you ever felt that your thoughts were directly interfered with or controlled by some outside force or person?
question.swahili: Katika mwaka uliopita, umewahi kuhisi kwamba mawazo yako yalikuwa yanaingiliwa au kudhibitiwa moja kwa moja na nguvu fulani ya nje au mtu?

question.english: Did this come about in a way that many people would find hard to believe, for instance, through telepathy?
question.swahili: Je, hii ilitokea kwa njia ambayo watu wengi wangeona ni ngumu kuamini, kwa mfano, kwa njia ya 'telepathy'?

question.english: Over the past year, have there been times when you felt that people were against you?
question.swahili: Katika mwaka uliopita, kumekuwa na nyakati ambapo ulihisi kwamba watu walikuwa kinyume na wewe?

question.english: Have there been times when you felt that people were deliberately acting to harm you or your interests?
question.swahili: Kumekuwa na nyakati ambapo ulihisi kwamba watu walikuwa wakifanya makusudi kukudhuru wewe au maslahi yako?

question.english: Have there been times when you felt that a group of people were plotting to cause you serious harm or injury?
question.swahili: Kumekuwa na nyakati ambapo ulihisi kwamba kundi la watu walikuwa wakipanga njama ya kukusababishia madhara makubwa au majeraha?

question.english: Over the past year, have there been times when you felt that something strange was going on?
question.swahili: Katika mwaka uliopita, kumekuwa na nyakati ambapo ulihisi kwamba kitu cha ajabu sana kilikuwa kikitokea?

question.english: Did you feel it was so strange that other people would find it very hard to believe?
question.swahili: Je, ulihisi ilikuwa ya ajabu sana kiasi kwamba watu wengine wangeona ni ngumu sana kuamini?

question.english: Over the past year, have there been times when you heard or saw things that other people couldn’t?
question.swahili: Katika mwaka uliopita, kumekuwa na nyakati ambapo ulisikia au kuona vitu ambavyo watu wengine hawakuweza?

question.english: Did you at any time hear voices saying quite a few words or sentences when there was no one around that might account for it?
question.swahili: Je, umewahi kusikia sauti zikisema maneno au sentensi kadhaa wakati hakuna mtu karibu ambaye angeweza kusababisha sauti hizo?

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Little interest or pleasure in doing things
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Kupoteza hamu au furaha katika shughuli za kila siku

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Kukosa furaha/kuboeka, mawazo mengi, au kukosa tumaini

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Shida ya kupata usingizi au kulala sana

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling tired or having little energy
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Kusikia uchovu au kuwa na nguvu kidogo

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Poor appetite or overeating
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Kukosa hamu ya kula au kula sana

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Kusikia vibaya au kwamba umeshindwa au umeaibisha familia yako

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Shida ya kuzingatia/kuwa makini kwa kazi yoyote nyumbani

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite — being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Kutembea au kuongea polepole sana kwamba watu wengine wangeweza kugundua. Au kutokuwa na uwezo wa kutulia kama kawaida

question.english: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself
question.swahili: Katika wiki 2 zilizopita, ni mara ngapi umekuwa ukisumbuliwa na shida zozote zifuatazo? Mawazo kwamba ungependelea kufa, au kujiumiza

question.english: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
question.swahili: Ikiwa umepatwa na shida yoyote, ni vipi shida hizi zimekusababishia ugumu kufanya kazi yako, kutunza vitu nyumbani, au kushirikiana vizuri na watu wengine?
